name: Vendor Compliance Validation UAE
description: This workflow automates the end-to-end process of collecting, validating, and verifying vendor business information for compliance with UAE business licensing, tax, and labor law regulations. It ensures that all required data is gathered, checked for accuracy, and cross-verified with relevant UAE authorities.
industry: Professional & Business Services - Compliance Documentation Management

workflowBlueprint.name: UAE Vendor Compliance Validation

input.description: Vendor business registration documents, ownership records, legal structure details, UAE contact information, business license copies, tax registration certificates, and labor law compliance attestations.

input_items.description: Ownership records and legal structure details

output.description: A structured compliance validation report for each vendor, including status of business information verification, licensing, tax, and labor law compliance.

output_items.description: List of non-compliant vendors with identified issues

process.description: The process involves extracting and validating vendor business information, verifying licensing and tax compliance with UAE authorities, and confirming adherence to UAE labor laws.

workflowBlueprint.industry: Professional & Business Services - Compliance Documentation Management

data_sets.name: UAE Labor Compliance Records
data_sets.source: UAE Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

publisher.name: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

workflowBlueprint.objective: Automate the validation of vendor business information and ensure compliance with UAE legal, regulatory, and operational requirements.
workflowBlueprint.description: This workflow automates the end-to-end process of collecting, validating, and verifying vendor business information for compliance with UAE business licensing, tax, and labor law regulations. It ensures that all required data is gathered, checked for accuracy, and cross-verified with relevant UAE authorities.

required_steps.input: vendor business registration documents, ownership records, legal structure details, UAE contact information, business license copies, tax registration certificates, labor law compliance attestations
required_steps.objective: Extract and structure all provided vendor business information for validation.
required_steps.description: Parse and organize vendor business registration documents, ownership records, legal structure details, UAE contact information, business license copies, tax registration certificates, and labor law compliance attestations into a standardized data format.

required_steps.objective: Validate the completeness and accuracy of vendor business information.
required_steps.description: Check that all required fields are present and verify the accuracy of business name, legal structure, ownership details, and UAE contact information against provided documentation.

required_steps.objective: Verify vendor business licensing status with UAE authorities.
required_steps.description: Cross-check business license details with relevant UAE licensing authorities to confirm validity and current standing.

required_steps.objective: Verify vendor tax registration and compliance with UAE tax authorities.
required_steps.description: Confirm the authenticity and validity of tax registration certificates and check for any outstanding tax compliance issues with UAE tax authorities.

required_steps.objective: Verify vendor compliance with UAE labor law requirements.
required_steps.description: Review labor law compliance attestations and cross-verify with UAE labor authorities to ensure adherence to all relevant labor regulations.

required_steps.objective: Generate a comprehensive compliance validation report for each vendor.
required_steps.description: Compile the results of business information validation, licensing, tax, and labor law compliance checks into a structured report, highlighting any non-compliance issues.

business_license_copy.description: The uploaded business license document that contains the license number, issue date, and expiry date.
business_license_copy.display_description: Upload the business license document file to extract license number, issue date, and expiry date.

value.address: Zenith A2 Tower, Dubai Sports City, UAE

uae_contact_information.description: Structured UAE contact information containing address, phone, and email fields to be validated.

email.description: The contact email address to be validated for standard email format.
email.display_description: Email address to be checked for presence and valid email syntax.

phone.description: The UAE phone number in international format, typically starting with +971.
phone.display_description: UAE phone number to be checked for presence and valid +971 format.

address.value: Office 1203, Tower A, Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai, UAE
address.description: The full UAE postal address, including street, city, and emirate.
address.display_description: Complete UAE address to validate for completeness and format.

uae_contact_information.display_description: UAE contact details including address, phone number, and email address.

tax_registration_certificate.description: The tax registration certificate document containing the official tax registration number and tax status.
tax_registration_certificate.display_description: Upload the official tax registration certificate to extract the tax registration number and tax status.

bank_details_proof.description: The uploaded proof of bank details, such as a bank statement or letter, to verify the vendor's banking information.
bank_details_proof.display_description: Upload a document as proof of bank details (e.g., bank statement or letter).

reviewed_business_license_validation_sta.description: The reviewed validation status of the business license as determined by the review node.
reviewed_business_license_validation_sta.display_description: The reviewed validation status of the business license.

reviewed_tax_registration_validation_sta.description: The reviewed validation status of the tax registration as determined by the review node.
reviewed_tax_registration_validation_sta.display_description: The reviewed validation status of the tax registration.

reviewed_bank_details_validation_status.description: The reviewed validation status of the provided bank details as determined by the review node.
reviewed_bank_details_validation_status.display_description: The reviewed validation status of the provided bank details.

reviewed_extracted_bank_account_informat.description: The reviewed extracted bank account information including account holder name, account number, bank name, IBAN, and branch as determined by the review node.
reviewed_extracted_bank_account_informat.display_description: The reviewed extracted bank account information (account holder, number, bank, IBAN, branch).

account_holder_name.description: The reviewed full name of the bank account holder, with any issues flagged.
account_holder_name.display_description: Reviewed name of the bank account holder

account_number.description: The reviewed bank account number, with any issues flagged.

bank_name.description: The reviewed name of the bank, with any issues flagged.

iban.description: The reviewed International Bank Account Number (IBAN), with any issues flagged.

branch.description: The reviewed branch of the bank, with any issues flagged.

reviewed_contact_information_validation_.description: The reviewed validation status of the contact information as determined by the review node.
reviewed_contact_information_validation_.display_description: The reviewed validation status of the contact information.

reviewed_contact_information_authenticit.description: The reviewed authenticity status of the provided contact information as determined by the review node.
reviewed_contact_information_authenticit.display_description: The reviewed authenticity status of the provided contact information.

important_dates.description: An array of analyzed key business dates for compliance tracking, including type, ISO date, days remaining, status, and recommended action.
important_dates.display_description: Array of analyzed key business dates for compliance tracking.

type_definition.description: A single important date entry with its compliance label and value.
type_definition.display_description: An entry containing a compliance-relevant date and its label.

date_label.description: The compliance-related label for the date (e.g., License Issue Date, License Expiry Date, Tax Registration Date, Other).
date_label.display_description: The type or label of the compliance date.

date_value.description: The value of the identified date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).
date_value.display_description: The extracted date in ISO format.
